channel.title: Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading. Help!
channel.description:
Alright I'm really mad now and this is the last time I'm trying to solve it and I will continue until its solved now because it's freaking me out, i tried in like 20+ computers and all give same error! I've tried on xp, vista and 7 but still same error. I'm on xp now.
here is the goddamn error:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/23mq5vc.jpg[/img]
I will thank you 59324705 times if you really solve this. I will give you all neccessary information. It's like that on ALL private servers, including webclients or downloaded ones.
THANK YOU.
edit: I had jre6 only. I downloaded newest java (jre7 and jdk something) and still same error.

item.title: Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading. Help!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

find your cache file. completly wipe it. then reboot ur computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading. Help!
